page.title: 06SCHOOLS IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
In Helmshore district there are no middle schools. There are two secondary schools, four primary schools, and one infant school.
Many new schools have been built in recent years. This is due to the fact that many new housing estates have developed. Some of the existing schools have had to build extensions to cope with increasing numbers of pupils.
{Helmshore County Primary School}was built in 1908. An extension was built in 1973, which is used by the Infant department. This is now one of the largest schools in the district.
